basics.name: arani (ron) bhattacharyay
basics.label: problem solver
basics.summary: Currently a second year studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Science with a minor in Statistics at the University of California, Berkeley. I like the colors of the school's I've been too, I'm not a huge fan of complicated UIs, and I heart random stats. In my free time I enjoy fiddling with guitars, cooking poorly, pretending to work out, reading fivethirtyeight, performing some stand-up on the side, blowing money at music festivals, and laughing at horrendously written television (think White Collar).

education.area: Elecstrical Engineering and Computer Science, Statistics
courses: CS61A - Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
PHYSICS 7B - Physics for Scientists and Engineers
HISTORY 162B - War and Peace: International Relations since 1914
